DRAFT OF 11/28/00-02

Robert J. Pooser

Division of Consumer Services
‘Second Floor, Mayo Building
Tallahassee, Florida 32399-0800

Your Ref. 00-0929754

 

in response tothe matte of A.V. Del Prete raised in your October 30, 2000 letter to
R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company. R.J. Reynolds does not fix the real price of its products, Retailers,
‘ot the manufacture, set the retail price of DORAL and other RJ. Reynolds brands. Therefore, it would
‘appear that if Mr. Del Prete has an issue with regard to the retail price of DORAL it would be with the
individual reiler.

[trust that this clarifies the matter. Do not hesitate to call me should you have any questions.

Sincerely,

RJR0000001571065184

70094 7627

summary: R.J. Reynolds does not fix the real price of its products. Retailers, not the manufacture, set the retail price. If A.V. Del Prete has an issue with regard to DORAL it would be with theindividual reiler. Do not hesitate to call me should you have any questions.
